title: Delta of the Gurupi, Maracacume, and Tiriacu Rivers
description: This is an image of the Rio Gurupi in the Brazilian state of Maranhao and its delta. It is the only open sea delta in the Americas and has more than 70 islands of various sizes. These islands are covered with mangrove forests, dunes, waterways, fresh water lagoons and natural beaches.
